class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        g = [i + 1 for i in range(n)]
        # print(g)
        ans = [n - 1]
        for u, v in queries:
            if g[u] == -1 or g[u] > v:
                ans.append(ans[-1])
                continue
            cnt = 0
            des = g[u]
            # print(u, g[u])
            while des < n and des != v:
                # print(des)
                tmp = g[des]
                # print(tmp)
                g[des] = -1
                des = tmp
                cnt += 1
            ans.append(ans[-1] - cnt)
            g[u] = v
        return ans[1:]
